channel.itunes:author: PodcastOne / Carolla Digital
channel.title: Adam Carolla Show
channel.description:
Welcome to the new home for Adam's rantings and ravings. This is the #1 Daily Downloaded Podcast in the World. GET IT ON as Adam shares his thoughts on current events, relationships, airport security, specialty pizzas, politics, and anything else he can complain about. Five days a week and completely uncensored, Adam welcomes a wide range of guests to join him in studio for in depth interviews and a front row seat to his unparalleled ranting. Let's not forget Bryan Bishop (Bald Bryan) on sound effects.
Check it out as Adam hangs out with some of his pals like: Larry Miller, David Allen Grier, Dr. Drew Pinksy, Dana Gould, Doug Benson, and many, many more.

item.title: Live from Vegas with Carrot Top and Josh Wolf (ACS November 4)
item.itunes:title: Live from Vegas with Carrot Top and Josh Wolf (ACS November 4)
item.description:
Adam takes the stage live at Wiseguys Comedy Club in Las Vegas. He expresses his regret wearing light khakis on stage and talks about the porn shops he drove by on the way to the club. Next, Josh Wolf and Carrot Top join and they share some stories about getting lost while on tour. Next, the three perform a round of 'Unprepared,' riffing on audience-submitted words like vagina, Trump, and armadillo. Plus the gang shares their thoughts on Spirit Airlines, Paul Reubens and shaving your butt.
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
Geico.com
PLUGS:
See Carrot Top live every night at the Luxor Hotel and for more dates visit CarrotTop.com
And follow him on Instagram, @CarrotTopLive
See Josh Wolf Live:
Tacoma, WA - TACOMA COMEDY CLUB - Tonight & Tomorrow
Boston, MA - LAUGH BOSTON - November 10 & 11
For more dates go to: Comedian Josh Wolf .com
Check out his show, ‘Family Tussle’ on his YouTube channel
And follow him on Twitter and Instagram, @JoshWolfComedy

item.title: Part 2: Patrick Renna + News (ACS November 3)
item.itunes:title: Part 2: Patrick Renna + News (ACS November 3)
item.description:
Actor Patrick Renna comes in and talks about the cultural impact of ‘The Sandlot’ and remembers how he and the other guys would get into trouble on set. He tells a story about meeting Mila Kunis and Dawson remembers getting drunk with Patrick at a party decades ago. Gina Grad reports the news of today including: people being killed during Halloween festivities in Seoul, Goodwill no longer accepting Kanye West clothing, Shanghai's Disney Resort closing abruptly with visitors stuck inside, and a man in a wheelchair rolling down the 405 Freeway.
PLUGS:
Visit HambinoAthletics.com to learn more about Patrick Renna’s new brand and foundation
And follow him on Instagram and TikTok, @PatrickRenna
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
Geico.com
SimpliSafe.com/ADAM
Meater.com
GoodRanchers.com/ Adam, Enter code: ADAM

item.title: Part 1: Eat Your Feelings + Listener Calls (ACS November 3)
item.itunes:title: Part 1: Eat Your Feelings + Listener Calls (ACS November 3)
item.description:
Adam and the gang discuss being unprepared for trick or treaters, people selling their children’s raffle tickets at the workplace, and how President Biden thinks airline ‘junk fees’ are unfair to people of color. They take a dive into the out of nowhere aerobics show, ‘Aerobicise’, and Gina presents ‘Eat Your Feelings’ where she used MEATER to cook onion-smothered pork tenderloin at the right temperature. Finally, they take some listener calls from people who have thoughts on John Popper and anime.
PLUGS:
Visit HambinoAthletics.com to learn more about Patrick Renna’s new brand and foundation
And follow him on Instagram and TikTok, @PatrickRenna
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
Geico.com

item.title: Part 2: Dane Cook + News (ACS November 2)
item.itunes:title: Part 2: Dane Cook + News (ACS November 2)
item.description:
Actor and Comedian, Dane Cook, comes in to talk about his new special, ‘Above it all’, which he filmed on the front porch of his house. Dane tells Adam about his half-brother/business manager embezzling millions from him and how he sent him back to the same prison he once worked at as a guard. Dane gets into his childhood, how he built his fan base, and his role in ‘Windy City Heat’. Gina Grad reports the news of today including: the attack on Nancy Pelosi’s husband, Elon Musk firing Twitter execs 'for cause' to avoid paying them severance, and Tom Brady and Gisele Bündchen finalizing their divorce.
PLUGS:
Watch Dane Cook’s new comedy special, ‘Above it all’ streaming now at: DaneCook.com
And follow him on Twitter @DaneCook
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
Geico.com
JoinCrowdHealth.com enter Adam
Meater.com
SimpliSafe.com/ADAM

item.title: Part 1: Gina Goes to a Nude Beach + Tales from the Cheap (ACS November 2)
item.itunes:title: Part 1: Gina Goes to a Nude Beach + Tales from the Cheap (ACS November 2)
item.description:
Adam, Bryan, and Gina give a recap on their time in San Diego including Gina’s experience at a nude beach. Adam remembers the time Al Lewis of ‘The Munsters’ took him to a nude beach when he was 10 before hearing some ‘Tales from the Cheap’. They hear from a person who was taken to Minor League Baseball games after the 4th inning when it was free and a guy who received nothing but Dollar Store items for his birthday. Finally, the Chassy Media crew share their own personal ‘Tales from the Cheap’.
PLUGS:
Watch Dane Cook’s new comedy special, ‘Above it all’ streaming now at: DaneCook.com
And follow him on Twitter @DaneCook
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
Geico.com

item.title: Leo Flowers, Live from San Diego (ACS November 1)
item.itunes:title: Leo Flowers, Live from San Diego (ACS November 1)
item.description: Adam takes the stage for a second night at Mic Drop Comedy in San Diego. He chats about a bike ride he took earlier in the day before complaining about a sign he saw at a cofeehouse. Comedian Leo Flowers, Gina, and Bryan join and the group talks about hairstyles and crypto. Next, Dawson leads a special San Diego-themed round of The Rotten Tomatoes Game before Gina reports news stories. For the final part of the show, Adam invites a middle school teacher on stage to join him for a round of "Adam Carolla is Unprepared"

item.title: Live from San Diego (ACS October 31)
item.itunes:title: Live from San Diego (ACS October 31)
item.description: Adam, Gina and Bryan are live at Mic Drop Comedy in San Diego, CA. They talk about how much Adam enjoyed the movie Paddington and pay compliments to the city of San Diego.The gang then plays a Halloween-themed round of Blah Blah Blog before Gina reports the news. Lastly, Adam invites a worship pastor on stage to pull balls for a round of "Adam Carolla is Unprepared."

item.title: Part 2: Tammy Pescatelli + News (ACS October 28)
item.itunes:title: Part 2: Tammy Pescatelli + News (ACS October 28)
item.description:
Comedian Tammy Pescatelli joins Adam in the studio and talks about losing her sense of smell from COVID and dealing with the Amish before telling the story of how she lost an HBO deal after making fun of the president’s socks. Gina Grad reports the news of today including: the death of the 'world's dirtiest man', a British radio host dying on air while doing morning show, Kanye West getting kicked out of Skechers' headquarters, and the Pope admitting that even priests and nuns watch pornography.
PLUGS:
Get your tickets for ‘Working Blue with Adam Carolla & John Popper’ January 20th and 21st here: https://traveljoy.com/bookings/zVru8UUbJPgEVYqyXuFSCVsN
Watch Danny Jolles’ full special, ‘You Choose: An Interactive Comedy Special’, available now on YouTube
Listen to Danny’s podcast, ‘Everything But The Scores With Danny Jolles’, wherever you find podcasts
Visit DannyJolles.com to see his live dates and follow him on Instagram, @DannyJolles
See Tammy Pescatelli live:
Las Vegas Nevada - Laugh Factory @Tropicana - November 3rd through 6th
Cleveland, OH - Hanna Theater at Playhouse Square - November 12th
And for more dates visit: Pescatelli.com
And follow her on Twitter and Instagram, @TammyPescatelli
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
GoodRanchers.com/ Adam, Enter code: ADAM
NextEvo.com enter ADAM

item.title: Part 1: John Popper + Danny Jolles (ACS October 28)
item.itunes:title: Part 1: John Popper + Danny Jolles (ACS October 28)
item.description:
John Popper of Blues Traveler calls in at the top of the show to announce their new event, ‘Working Blue with Adam Carolla & John Popper’ January 20th and 21st in Dallas. John talks about covering Police songs and how being in a wheelchair for 2 years led to a performance gimmick that once made Dawson cry. Speaking of which, Dawson tells them about the fire his dog started in his kitchen last night. Actor and comedian Danny Jolles comes in to talk about his innovative standup special, ‘You Choose: An Interactive Comedy Special’ where viewers can actually choose how they want the special to go.
PLUGS:
Get your tickets for ‘Working Blue with Adam Carolla & John Popper’ January 20th and 21st here: https://traveljoy.com/bookings/zVru8UUbJPgEVYqyXuFSCVsN
Watch Danny Jolles’ full special, ‘You Choose: An Interactive Comedy Special’, available now on YouTube
Listen to Danny’s podcast, ‘Everything But The Scores With Danny Jolles’, wherever you find podcasts
Visit DannyJolles.com to see his live dates and follow him on Instagram, @DannyJolles
See Tammy Pescatelli live:
Las Vegas Nevada - Laugh Factory @Tropicana - November 3 through 6
Cleveland, OH - Hanna Theater at Playhouse Square - November 12
And for more dates visit: Pescatelli.com
And follow her on Twitter and Instagram, @TammyPescatelli
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
GoodRanchers.com/ Adam, Enter code: ADAM

item.title: Part 2: Gavin Rossdale + News (ACS October 27)
item.itunes:title: Part 2: Gavin Rossdale + News (ACS October 27)
item.description:
The lead singer of Bush, Gavin Rossdale, talks to Adam about their new album, ‘The Art of Survival’. The two reminisce about KROQ and take a dive into the songs of Leonard Cohen before Gavin explains he’s worried his kids might not think he’s cool. Gina Grad reports the news of today including: the man who drove an SUV into a Christmas parade being found guilty and an airline launching a lottery to entice more passengers to sit in the middle seat.
PLUGS:
Download or stream Bush’s new album, ‘The Art of Survival’ wherever you find music
To see Bush live, visit BushOfficial.com to see upcoming tour dates
Watch Robert F. Kennedy Jr.’s documentary ‘The Real Anthony Fauci’ at TheRealAnthonyFauciMovie.com
And follow him on Twitter, @RobertKennedyJr
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
SimpliSafe.com/ADAM
Stamps.com enter ADAM

item.title: Part 1: Baldywood Presents: Black Adam + Robert F. Kennedy Jr. (ACS October 27)
item.itunes:title: Part 1: Baldywood Presents: Black Adam + Robert F. Kennedy Jr. (ACS October 27)
item.description:
Adam remembers how his impossibly small bedroom (which was actually a service porch) saved him from being shamed as a bedwetter like actor Michael Landon was. Bryan presents another segment of ‘Baldywood’ and gives his review on ‘Black Adam’. Finally, Robert F. Kennedy Jr. joins them to discuss his new documentary, Bill Gates, and why he wants the records of vaccine testing to be released.
PLUGS:
Download or stream Bush’s new album, ‘The Art of Survival’ wherever you find music
To see Bush live, visit BushOfficial.com to see upcoming tour dates

And follow him on Twitter, @RobertKennedyJr

item.title: Part 2: Court Crandall + News (ACS October 26)
item.itunes:title: Part 2: Court Crandall + News (ACS October 26)
item.description:
Writer and Director, Court Crandall, joins the gang to tell them about his new movie, ‘Bromates’ and shares his experience working with Snoop Dogg. Court and Adam compare the times they had to pitch to Ivan Reitman and their favorite ESPN spots before getting into bathroom etiquette. Gina Grad reports the news of today including: Adidas dumping Kanye West over anti-Semitic remarks, Brittney Griner's appeal being rejected, Harvey Weinstein’s trial beginning in LA, and Jake Paul advising bettors not to put money on Anderson Silva.
PLUGS:
Watch Jodie Sweetin’s new movies ‘Merry Swissmas’ (premiering Saturday, November 5th on Lifetime) and ‘A Cozy Christmas Inn’ (premiering Friday on the Hallmark Channel).
And follow her on Instagram, @JodieSweetin
See Court Crandall’s new movie, ‘Bromates’ available now on VOD
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
Geico.com
GoodRanchers.com/Adam and Enter code: ADAM
This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp
BetterHelp.com/CAROLLA

item.title: Part 1: Dee-Fence! + Jodie Sweetin (ACS October 26)
item.itunes:title: Part 1: Dee-Fence! + Jodie Sweetin (ACS October 26)
item.description:
Adam takes a look at a transgender TikTok star’s interview with Joe Biden and Gina explains the process of ‘tucking’. Next, one of the heroes who brandished the “Dee Fence'' signs at an NFL game calls in to give insight into the story behind it. And finally, actress Jodie Sweetin sits down and explains how critics never liked ‘Full House’ but its success came from comforting the audience. She remembers how the cast felt like a real family and shares stories about her close friendship with her TV dad, Bob Saget.
PLUGS:
Watch Jodie Sweetin’s new movies ‘Merry Swissmas’ (premiering Saturday, November 5th on Lifetime) and ‘A Cozy Christmas Inn’ (premiering Friday on the Hallmark Channel).
And follow her on Instagram, @JodieSweetin
See Court Crandall’s new movie, ‘Bromates’ available now on VOD
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
Geico.com
GoodRanchers.com/ Adam, Enter code: ADAM
This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp
BetterHelp.com/CAROLLA

item.title: Part 2: Greg Fitzsimmons + News (ACS October 25)
item.itunes:title: Part 2: Greg Fitzsimmons + News (ACS October 25)
item.description:
Comedian Greg Fitzsimmons returns to the show! They look at some controversy surrounding the woman who famously accepted Marlon Brando’s Godfather Oscar on his behalf and take a dive into the song ‘Makin' It’ by David Naughton. Greg recalls the time he watched the Beach Boys play live at Bob Saget’s birthday party and Adam gets an update on his childhood home. Gina Grad reports the news of today including: someone maturbating into Greg’s neighbor’s flowerbed, the death of actor Leslie Jordan, Kanye West saying he's not backing down from anti-semetic comments, and updates on Salman Rushdie’s condition.
PLUGS:
Check out Vinnie Tortorich’s movie ‘Beyond Impossible’ available to rent or buy on Amazon
Listen to Vinnie Tortorich’s ‘Fitness Confidential with Vinnie Tortorich’ wherever you find podcasts
And follow him on Twitter and Instagram: @VinnieTortorich
Listen to Erin Coscarelli’s ‘EntertainHER’ Wherever you find podcasts
And follow her on Instagram, @ErinCoscarelli
See Greg Fitzsimmons live:
San Francisco, CA - Punch Line - November 3rd through 5th
Tampa, FL - Side Splitters - November 17th through 19th
And for more dates, go to GREGFITZSIMMONS.com
Check out Greg Fitzsimmons’ podcasts, ‘Fitzdog Radio’ and ‘Sunday Papers’, available wherever you listen to podcasts
And follow him on Twitter, @GregFitzShow
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
Geico.com
SimpliSafe.com/ADAM

item.title: Part 1: Vinnie Tortorich + Erin Coscarelli (ACS October 25)
item.itunes:title: Part 1: Vinnie Tortorich + Erin Coscarelli (ACS October 25)
item.description:
Adam and the gang take a look at the history of horribly racist Hustler cartoons and learn more about the artist behind them. Fitness guru, Vinnie Tortorich, calls in to talk about the biggest takeaways he got from completing Colin O'Brady’s ‘12 Hour Walk’ challenge. Former Raiders reporter and host of the Tennis Channel, Erin Coscarelli, joins them in the studio and shares her thoughts on Tom Brady’s refusal to retire, Aaron Rodgers use of ayahuasca, and the Jon Gruden lawsuit.
PLUGS:
Check out Vinnie Tortorich’s movie ‘Beyond Impossible’ available to rent or buy on Amazon
Listen to Vinnie Tortorich’s ‘Fitness Confidential with Vinnie Tortorich’ wherever you find podcasts
And follow him on Twitter and Instagram: @VinnieTortorich
Listen to Erin Coscarelli’s ‘EntertainHER’ wherever you find podcasts
And follow her on Instagram, @ErinCoscarelli
See Greg Fitzsimmons live:
San Francisco, CA - Punch Line - November 3rd through 5th
Tampa, FL - Side Splitters - November 17th through 19th
And for more dates, go to GREGFITZSIMMONS.com
Check out Greg Fitzsimmons’ podcasts, ‘Fitzdog Radio’ and ‘Sunday Papers’, available wherever you listen to podcasts
And follow him on Twitter, @GregFitzShow

item.title: Part 2: Kevin Nealon + News (ACS October 24)
item.itunes:title: Part 2: Kevin Nealon + News (ACS October 24)
item.description:
Actor and comedian, Kevin Nealon, joins Adam in the studio to talk about his new book, ‘I Exaggerate: My Brushes with Fame’, a collection of caricature portraits and personal stories about the notable people he has met throughout his life. Gina Grad reports the news of today including: Steve Bannon being sentenced to 4 months for contempt of Congress, daycare workers being charged after scaring kids with a ‘Scream’ mask, and a new horror movie that is so terrifying it is causing people to vomit and faint.
PLUGS:
Check out Kevin Nealon’s book, ‘I Exaggerate: My Brushes with Fame’ available tomorrow wherever you find books
See Kevin Nealon live:
Grand Rapids, MI - Grand Rapids Comedy Club - November 10 & 11
Holland, MI - Park Theater - November 12
And for more dates, visit KevinNealon.com
And follow him on Twitter, @Kevin_Nealon
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
Geico.com
The Jordan Harbinger Show

item.title: Part 1: Sorority Boys + The Rotten Tomatoes Game (ACS October 24)
item.itunes:title: Part 1: Sorority Boys + The Rotten Tomatoes Game (ACS October 24)
item.description:
Adam and the gang look at the works of Loverboy before getting into diversity initiatives in the NHL and blind auditions at the New York Philharmonic. They read a story about a transgender woman joining a sorority and take a dive into the 2002 movie ‘Sorority Boys’. Finally, they all play a round of The Rotten Tomatoes Game with movies which won the Oscar for best costume design.
PLUGS:
Check out Kevin Nealon’s book, ‘I Exaggerate: My Brushes with Fame’ available tomorrow wherever you find books
See Kevin Nealon live:

item.title: Part 2: Fisher Stevens + News (ACS October 21)
item.itunes:title: Part 2: Fisher Stevens + News (ACS October 21)
item.description:
Actor and director, Fisher Stevens, talks to Adam about his new documentary series, ‘The Lincoln Project’ where he followed the Republican effort to stop the reelection of Donald Trump. Fisher then talks about the new documentary series he’s working on about David Beckham and outlines his experience working on ‘Succession’. Gina Grad reports the news of today including: Kevin Spacey being found not liable for battery, Matthew Perry opening up about his opioid addiction, Andy Dick getting arrested for stealing power tools, Jamaica banning broadcasts deemed to glorify drugs or crime, and BTS joining the military.
PLUGS:
Watch Fisher Stevens’ documentary series, ‘The Lincoln Project’ airing now on Showtime
Go to ConvoyOfHope.org to support hurricane Ian relief
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
SimpliSafe.com/ADAM
Geico.com
Con-Cret.com/PODCAST

item.title: Part 1: Windy City Heat Revist + Listener Calls (ACS October 21)
item.itunes:title: Part 1: Windy City Heat Revist + Listener Calls (ACS October 21)
item.description:
Adam recaps the recent Hollywood Improv Show he performed with Jeremy Piven, Brad Williams, and the Sklar brothers, and shows the gang part of Jennifer Lopez’s Netflix documentary 'Halftime'. Adam talks about one of his recent ‘Take a Knee’ guests who created the ‘12-Hour Walk’ and revisits an iconic scene from ‘Windy City Heat’. The gang takes some listener calls from someone who wants to take a deeper dive into “Black People React” videos and another who wonders if Kanye deserves all the hate he’s been getting.
PLUGS:
Watch Fisher Stevens’ documentary series, ‘The Lincoln Project’ airing now on Showtime
Go to ConvoyOfHope.org to support hurricane Ian relief
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
SimpliSafe.com/ADAM

item.title: Tony Bobulinski on The Biden Family Scandal (ACS October 20)
item.itunes:title: Tony Bobulinski on The Biden Family Scandal (ACS October 20)
item.description:
Adam sits down with Hunter Biden’s former business partner, Tony Bobulinski. Tony outlines how he came to be involved with Hunter Biden and why he went from partner to whistleblower when he handed over incriminatory information to the FBI. Tony explains how he saw the media completely black out his story and gaslight the American people and remembers the time Congressman Adam Schiff accused him of being part of a Kremlin disinformation operation. Tony expresses that the scandal goes much further than just a laptop and even beyond the Biden family.
PLUGS:
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
GoodRanchers.com/Adam, Enter code: ADAM
Geico.com
CozyEarth.com/ACS

item.title: Part 2: Ethan Wayne + News (ACS October 19)
item.itunes:title: Part 2: Ethan Wayne + News (ACS October 19)
item.description:
Actor Ethan Wayne comes to the studio and talks about his experience growing up as the son of John Wayne and how his father would pull him out of school to take him on location. Ethan explains how being around stunt guys at a young age led him to pursue stunt work on ‘The Blues Brothers’ and talks about the exhibit he’s curated in Texas showcasing the life and work of his father. Gina Grad reports the news of today including: a NY congressional candidate releasing a sex tape to highlight their 'sex positive' platform, James Corden apologizing after being banned from a restaurant, and Selma Blair's final performance.
PLUGS:
Visit the pop-up store, ‘The Williams Racing Experience’, open today through Sunday at 800 Congress in downtown Austin
Join the musical event: Williams Racing Presents: ‘DJ Cassidy's Pass The Mic’, live on Friday at Austin City Limits
And follow Jenson on Twitter, @JensonButton
Listen to Ethan Wayne’s ‘John Wayne Gritcast’ wherever you find podcasts
Visit the exhibit, ‘John Wayne: an American Experience’, open 7 days a week in Fort Worth, Texas
And follow him and his dog Finn on Instagram, @TravelingWithFinn
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
GoodRanchers.com/ Adam, Enter code: ADAM
SimpliSafe.com/ADAM
Geico.com

item.title: Part 1: Jenson Button + Leaving California (ACS October 19)
item.itunes:title: Part 1: Jenson Button + Leaving California (ACS October 19)
item.description:
Former F1 Championship driver, Jenson Button, joins the gang to talk about the upcoming events he is involved in with Williams Racing during the US Grand Prix week. He teases an upcoming Formula 1 documentary he is working on with Keanu Reeves and explains why the most important person to beat in a race is your teammate. The gang looks at some stories about Mark Wahlberg trying to make Vegas into 'Hollywood 2.0' and a New York Times columnist who is worried that "white supremacy" will be replaced by "lite supremacy".
PLUGS:
Visit the pop-up store, ‘The Williams Racing Experience’, open today through Sunday at 800 Congress in downtown Austin
Join the musical event: Williams Racing Presents: ‘DJ Cassidy's Pass The Mic’, live on Friday at Austin City Limits
And follow Jenson Button on Twitter, @JensonButton
Listen to Ethan Wayne’s ‘John Wayne Gritcast’ wherever you find podcasts
Visit the exhibit, ‘John Wayne: an American Experience’, open 7 days a week in Fort Worth, Texas
And follow him and his dog Finn on Instagram, @TravelingWithFinn
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
GoodRanchers.com/ Adam, Enter code: ADAM
SimpliSafe.com/ADAM
Geico.com

item.title: Part 2: Orny Adams + News (ACS October 18)
item.itunes:title: Part 2: Orny Adams + News (ACS October 18)
item.description:
Comedian Orny Adams stops by and gives some insights into Boston culture such as how Red Sox fans are always booing the Yankees no matter what team they are actually playing and how Boston blue collar workers are funnier than most comedians. He joins the gang as they get into urinal trough diving, Super Denim versus Toughskins jeans, and ‘What's Happening!!’. Gina Grad reports the news of today including: Bill Murray facing an avalanche of new accusations and Chicago being named the rattiest city in the US.
PLUGS:
See Rob Schneider’s new movie ‘Daddy Daughter Trip’ now showing in select cities at Cinemark and Harkins Theaters
See Rob live in Homestead, PA at Pittsburgh Improv: November 25th through 27th
Find more dates on his website: RobSchneider.com
And follow him on Twitter, @RobSchneider
To see the schedule of Orny Adams live shows, visit OrnyAdams.com
Check out ‘What's Wrong With Orny Adams’ wherever you find podcasts
Watch Orny Adams’ full special, ‘More Than Loud’, on YouTube
And follow him on Twitter, @OrnyAdams
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
TommyJohn.com/ADAM
Investall.ai enter ADAM
Geico.com

item.title: Part 1: Rob Schneider + Trending Topics (ACS October 18)
item.itunes:title: Part 1: Rob Schneider + Trending Topics (ACS October 18)
item.description:
Adam gives a recap from Velocity Invitational before Rob Schneider calls in to talk to Adam about his new movie, ‘Daddy Daughter Trip’. Rob lists some of the passion projects he has on his bucket list and clarifies his recent comments about Bill Murray. Chris presents ‘Trending Topics’ including a Tennessee goal post going on the journey of a lifetime, Coach Todd Bowles shutting down reporters implying his friendship with Mike Tomlin is centered on race, and a fight breaking out at Hooters over a chocolate bar.
PLUGS:
See Rob Schneider’s new movie ‘Daddy Daughter Trip’ now showing in select cities at Cinemark and Harkins Theaters
See Rob live in Homestead, PA at Pittsburgh Improv: November 25th through 27th
Find more dates on his website: RobSchneider.com
And follow him on Twitter, @RobSchneider
To see the schedule of Orny Adams live shows, visit OrnyAdams.com

And follow him on Twitter, @OrnyAdams

item.title: Dana Gould & Sid Krofft (ACS October 17)
item.itunes:title: Dana Gould & Sid Krofft (ACS October 17)
item.description:
Adam is joined once again by writer and comedian Dana Gould who shares stories of his father only bringing shorts to wear for his recent wedding and assuming he was gay for not wanting to go hunting. They take a look at Huell Howser’s only music video and revisit the murder of Bob Crane from ‘Hogan’s Heroes’. Sid Krofft returns to the studio and reunites with Dana- whom he worked with on the scrapped adaptation of ‘Sigmund and the Sea Monsters’. Adam and Sid recap the brunch they had last week and Sid shares stories of his life including meeting Michael Jackson’s chimpanzee and Paul Simon taking credit for the ‘H.R. Pufnstuf’ theme song.
PLUGS:
Check out Sid Krofft’s show ‘Sundays With Sid’ with new episodes 3pm Pacific every Sunday on his Instagram: @SidKrofft
See Dana Gould Live:
Kansas City, MO - The Comedy Club Of Kansas City - November 3rd to 5th
San Francisco, CA - Punch Line San Francisco - November 10th to 12th
For more live dates go to DanaGould.com
Check out ‘The Dana Gould Hour’ wherever you listen to podcasts
And follow him on Twitter, @DanaGould
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
Geico.com

item.title: Mike Cannon + Deontay Wilder (ACS October 14)
item.itunes:title: Mike Cannon + Deontay Wilder (ACS October 14)
item.description:
Comedian Mike Cannon joins Adam and tells him about his new special ‘Mike Cannon's Huge Mistake’ where he took 150mg of edibles before going on stage. Mike joins the gang as Adam explains how he went down a YouTube rabbithole watching “Black People React to” videos. Gina Grad reports the news of today including: Ryan Reynolds responding to the comments TJ Miller made last week when he was on the show, Alex Jones being ordered to pay Sandy Hook victims' families nearly $1 billion, and Cher selling her Malibu estate. Finally, Adam talks to former heavyweight champion, Deontay Wilder, about his upcoming fight against Robert Helenius.
PLUGS:
See Mike Cannon live:
Las Vegas, NV - Skankfest Vegas- Tonight through October 16th
Point Pleasant, NJ - Uncle Vinne’s Comedy Club - October 19th & 20th
And for more dates go to MikeCannonComedy.com
Watch his special, ‘Mike Cannon's Huge Mistake’ available for free on YouTube
And follow him on Twitter and Instagram, @IamMikeCannon
Watch Deontay Wilder face off against Robert Helenius on FOX Sports PBC Pay-Per-View Tomorrow at 9PM Eastern
And follow him on Instagram, @BronzeBomber
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
TommyJohn.com/ADAM
GoodRanchers.com/ Adam, Enter code: ADAM
Geico.com

item.title: Part 2: Robert Davi + News (ACS October 13)
item.itunes:title: Part 2: Robert Davi + News (ACS October 13)
item.description:
Director Robert Davi talks to Adam about his new movie ‘My Son Hunter’ which revolves around Hunter Biden's lifestyle and foreign business deals. They get into the laptop scandal, Tony Bobulinski, and media coverage bias. Gina Grad reports the news of today including: Harvey Weinstein's sexual assault trial beginning in Los Angeles, Tom Cruise planning to film a movie in space, and iPhone 14's crash detection calling emergency services on roller coasters.
PLUGS:
Look out for Josie Davis’ movie ‘Black Balsam’, coming soon
And follow her on Twitter and Instagram, @JosieDavis
Watch Robert Davi’s movie, ‘My Son Hunter’ now available to stream or download at MySonHunter.com
And follow him on Twitter, @RobertJohnDavi
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
Con-Cret.com/PODCAST
Geico.com
SimpliSafe.com/ADAM
BlindsGalore.com, let them know we sent you

item.title: Part 1: Mayor Debates + Josie Davis (ACS October 13)
item.itunes:title: Part 1: Mayor Debates + Josie Davis (ACS October 13)
item.description:
Adam talks about his struggle to get his son interested in a driver’s license and how both nature and nurture have failed. They take a look at some highlights from the LA Mayoral debate where everything seems to revolve around race. Actress Josie Davis comes in to share stories from her career and reminds Adam of the date the two went on 20 years ago after she was on ‘Loveline’.

item.title: Part 1: California Bullet Train + Jorge Masvidal (ACS October 12)
item.itunes:title: Part 1: California Bullet Train + Jorge Masvidal (ACS October 12)
item.description:
Adam, Bryan, and Gina discuss some questionable NFL calls and the massive failure of California’s bullet train project. Jorge Masvidal calls into the show to talk about the upcoming iKon Fighting Championships on October 14th streaming on UFC Fight Pass. The gang takes a look at his brutal bare-knuckle street fight against the Kimbo Slice protege, Ray. Jorge gives his thoughts on the upcoming Jake Paul vs Anderson Silva fight and gives some insight into which up-and-coming UFC fighters we should keep an eye on.
PLUGS:
Watch the ‘iKon Fighting Championships’ on October 14th on UFC Fight Pass or buy tickets now.
And follow Jorge Masvidal on Twitter and Instagram, @GamebredFighter
See Josh Wolf live:
Portland, OR - Helium Comedy Club Portland - Tomorrow through Saturday
Omaha, NE - Omaha Funny Bone - October 21th & 22th
And for more dates go to: ComedianJoshWolf.com
Check out Josh Wolf’s show ‘Family Tussle’ streaming now on YouTube
And follow him on Twitter and Instagram: @JoshWolfComedy

item.title: Part 2: Josh Wolf + News (ACS October 12)
item.itunes:title: Part 2: Josh Wolf + News (ACS October 12)
item.description:
Comedian Josh Wolf comes to the studio to talk to Adam about his new show ‘Family Tussle’ where he faces off against his son in various challenges. They get into embarrassing zed cards, Martha Raye’s denture cleaner commercials, Tom Selleck’s mortgage commercials, and how riding electric bikes can make you feel above the law. Gina Grad reports the news of today including: the death of Angela Lansbury, scientists developing cannabis breathalyzers, and New Zealand floating a climate tax on livestock flatulence.
PLUGS:
Watch the ‘iKon Fighting Championships’ on October 14th on UFC Fight Pass or buy tickets now
And follow Jorge Masvidal on Twitter and Instagram, @GamebredFighter
See Josh Wolf live:
Portland, OR - Helium Comedy Club Portland - Tomorrow through Saturday
Omaha, NE - Omaha Funny Bone - October 21th & 22th
And for more dates go to: ComedianJoshWolf.com

And follow him on Twitter and Instagram: @JoshWolfComedy

item.title: Part 2: Tito Ortiz + News (ACS October 11)
item.itunes:title: Part 2: Tito Ortiz + News (ACS October 11)
item.description:
Former UFC Champion, Tito Ortiz, returns to the studio to talk about his upcoming event, ‘Freedom Fight Night 3’. He makes predictions about the upcoming fight between Jake Paul and Anderson Silva, recaps his experience boxing Silva last year, and talks about going to Fort Myers to help rebuild after the devastating destruction caused by Hurricane Ian. Gina Grad reports the news of today including: a driver dying after his GPS led him off a washed out bridge, Kanye West getting his Twitter account locked after antisemetic comments, Michael Rapaport’s response to Kanye’s comments, Madonna appearring to come out as gay, Russian soldiers getting duped by a Ukraine dating app, and Iranian state TV interrupted by an apparent hack.
PLUGS:
Watch Tito Ortiz’ UFL event, ‘Freedom Fight Night 3’. Get tickets or stream on YouTube PPV on November 4th.
Help Tito Ortiz raise money to help rebuild Florida after Hurricane Ian by donating to his GoFundMe
And follow Tito on Twitter: @TitoOrtiz
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
LectricEBikes.com
Keeps.com/ADAM
Business.LandsEnd.com/ADAM and enter ADAM
Geico.com

item.title: Part 1: Catalytic Converter Theft + Trending Topics (ACS October 11)
item.itunes:title: Part 1: Catalytic Converter Theft + Trending Topics (ACS October 11)
item.description:
Chris zooms in due to the recent theft of his Prius’ catalytic converter and Adam looks into the massive rise in stolen catalytic converters in Oregon and California. The gang looks at the recent story of an L.A. City Councilmember stepping down because of her racist comments and talks about how high self esteem can create monsters. Chris presents some ‘Trending Topics’ including people boycotting PayPal, NBA’s Draymond Green punching Jordan Poole at Warriors practice, and Kanye West’s declining partnership with Adidas.
PLUGS:
Watch Tito Ortiz’ UFL event, ‘Freedom Fight Night 3’. Get tickets or stream on YouTube PPV on November 4th.
Help Tito Ortiz raise money to help rebuild Florida after Hurricane Ian by donating to his GoFundMe
And follow Tito on Twitter: @TitoOrtiz

item.title: Part 2: Ryan Sickler + News (ACS October 10)
item.itunes:title: Part 2: Ryan Sickler + News (ACS October 10)
item.description:
Comedian and host, Ryan Sickler, joins the gang in the studio and compares his experiences with Adam about working in radio. Adam talks about some bad open bar etiquette he witnessed at Fran Drescher’s party and decides there needs to be a cut off for how many steps it takes to make the drink you order. Gina Grad reports the news of today including: Biden pardoning all federal offenses of marijuana possession, Judy Tenuta dying, updates on the nightmare divorce of Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt, and a pilot suing after their colleague watched porn in the cockpit.
PLUGS:
See Ryan Sickler live:
Chicago, IL - Zanies Rosemont - November 11th & 12th
Grand Rapids, MI - Full House Comedy Club - December 9 & 10
For more dates go to: RyanSickler.com
Listen to Ryan’s podcast, ‘The HoneyDew Podcast’
And follow him on Twitter, @RyanSickler
Follow Ward Connerly on Twitter, @ToBeEqual
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
SimpliSafe.com/ADAM
Geico.com
GoodRanchers.com/Adam, Enter code: ADAM
Freshly.com/ACS

item.title: Part 1: Hypotheticals + Ward Connerly (ACS October 10)
item.itunes:title: Part 1: Hypotheticals + Ward Connerly (ACS October 10)
item.description:
Adam gets into the declining trend in shoes, methods for ear wax removal, and who should replace Trevor Noah on ‘The Daily Show’. The gang gets into some hypotheticals about smoking and who they would rather have a beer with, Tom Brady or William Shatner. Activist Ward Connerly talks to Adam about how he views affirmative action as a form of racial discrimination and explains how it’s currenty being rebranded as ‘diversity, equity, and inclusion’.
PLUGS:
See Ryan Sickler live:
Chicago, IL - Zanies Rosemont - November 11th & 12th
Grand Rapids, MI - Full House Comedy Club - December 9 & 10
For more dates go to: RyanSickler.com
Listen to Ryan’s podcast, ‘The HoneyDew Podcast’
And follow him on Twitter, @RyanSickler

item.title: Part 2: Mena Suvari + News (ACS October 7)
item.itunes:title: Part 2: Mena Suvari + News (ACS October 7)
item.description:
Actress Mena Suvari talks to the gang about her new horror movie, ‘The Accursed’ before explaining how ‘American Pie’ gave her the closest thing to a high school experience and how working on ‘American Beauty’ saved her life. Gina Grad reports the news of today including: Alex Jones fleeing his trial on a private jet, a doctor saying Tua Tagovailoa should retire, and a protestor getting tackled by Bobby Wagner at an NFL game.
PLUGS:
See Mena Suvari’s new movie, ‘The Accursed’ in theaters and on demand October 14th
Check out Mena’s book ‘The Great Peace: A Memoir’ wherever you find books
And follow her on Instagram @MenaSuvari
For more information on or to donate to World Food Bank, visit WorldFoodBank.org
Listen to Smriti Kirubanandan’s ‘HLTH Forward’ wherever you find podcasts https://open.spotify.com/show/13FAjCcsEXkGNSIJxP73Vy?si=XX5yHYt6TzmYJksHrx94mw

item.title: Part 1: Grandma Stories + World Food Bank (ACS October 7)
item.itunes:title: Part 1: Grandma Stories + World Food Bank (ACS October 7)
item.description:
The gang takes a look at stories about a girl’s volleyball team being banned from their locker room, mask surveys at Amherst College, and the Mayor of New Orleans downplaying their murder rate. Adam tells the story of how his Grandmother once used Bon Jovi to steal focus from Adam and the Feast of San Gennaro. Ricahrd Lackey and Smriti Kirubanandan from World Food Bank come into the studio to talk about their mission to end hunger and extreme poverty in developing nations.
PLUGS:
See Mena Suvari’s new movie, ‘The Accursed’ in theaters and on demand October 14th
Check out Mena’s book ‘The Great Peace: A Memoir’ wherever you find books
And follow her on Instagram @MenaSuvari
For more information on or to donate to World Food Bank, visit WorldFoodBank.org
Listen to Smriti Kirubanandan’s ‘HLTH Forward’ wherever you find podcasts https://open.spotify.com/show/13FAjCcsEXkGNSIJxP73Vy?si=XX5yHYt6TzmYJksHrx94mw

item.title: Part 1: Liked Tweets + Jake Paul (ACS October 6)
item.itunes:title: Part 1: Liked Tweets + Jake Paul (ACS October 6)
item.description:
Adam remembers his ‘Take a Knee’ interview with Terry Crews before learning more information about the role his grandmother played in the life of gay rights activist, Harry Hay. The gang takes a look at some ‘Liked Tweets’ including a Dutch tunnel being constructed in days, Newsom decriminalizing jaywalking and Joy Reid’s comments about Ron DeSantis and looting. Jake Paul calls in the show to talk about his upcoming boxing match against Anderson Silva and explains how to take a punch.
PLUGS:
Watch Jake Paul’s match against Anderson Silva on SHOWTIME PPV October 29th or get your tickets to see it live
Anf follow Jake on Twitter and Instagram, @JakePaul
Read William Shatner’s new book ‘BOLDLY GO: Reflections on a Life of Awe and Wonder’ available wherever you find books
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
Geico.com
Con-Cret.com/PODCAST
SimpliSafe.com/ADAM

item.title: Part 2: William Shatner + News (ACS October 6)
item.itunes:title: Part 2: William Shatner + News (ACS October 6)
item.description:
William Shatner joins the gang to talk about his new book ‘BOLDLY GO: Reflections on a Life of Awe and Wonder’. He describes the process of creating the collection of essays and gets into his philosophical beliefs about entanglement in the universe and how there may be no such thing as coincidence. Gina Grad reports the news of today including: Tom Brady and Gisele Bündchen hiring divorce lawyers, Alec Baldwin settling the wrongful death lawsuit against him, and Whoopi Goldberg denying she wore a fat suit.
PLUGS:
Watch Jake Paul’s match against Anderson Silva on SHOWTIME PPV October 29th or get your tickets to see it live
And follow Jake on Twitter and Instagram, @JakePaul
Read William Shatner’s new book ‘BOLDLY GO: Reflections on a Life of Awe and Wonder’ available wherever you find books

item.title: Part 2: TJ Miller + News (ACS October 5)
item.itunes:title: Part 2: TJ Miller + News (ACS October 5)
item.description:
Actor and comedian TJ Miller returns to talk about his new comedy special, ‘Dear Jonah’, that took a surprising turn when a heckler got involved and changed everything. TJ gets into his upcoming projects and tells the story of an awkward on-set moment with Ryan Reynolds while filming ‘Deadpool’. Gina Grad reports the news of today including: Herschel Walker’s son denouncing his father’s campaign, Antonio Brown exposing himself in a pool, and fishermen being accused of using weights to cheat at a tournament.
PLUGS:
Check out Amala’s show ‘Unapologetic with Amala’ available at PragerU.com & streaming on YouTube
And follow her on Instagram, @TheAmalaEkpunobi
Watch TJ Miller’s full comedy special, ‘Dear Jonah’ for free on YouTube
See TJ Miller live:
Tacoma, Washington - Tacoma Comedy Club - Friday and Saturday
Louisville, Kentucky - Louisville Comedy Club - October 14 & 15
Find more dates go to: TJMillerDoesNotHaveAWebsite.com
And follow him on Twitter, @NotTJMiller
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
Geico.com
GoodRanchers.com/ Adam, Enter code: ADAM
BlindsGalore.com, let them know we sent you
Con-Cret.com/PODCAST

item.title: Part 1: Ace on the Mountain + PragerU’s Amala Ekpunobi (ACS October 5)
item.itunes:title: Part 1: Ace on the Mountain + PragerU’s Amala Ekpunobi (ACS October 5)
item.description:
The gang takes a look at Jon Hamm’s recent remarks about kicking Dave Dameshek out of his fantasy football league and the party he was at with Adam and Tom Cruise. Adam recounts his trip to Zion National Park featuring magician billboards and spa locker rooms before breaking down Kamala Harris’ hurricane relief plan. PragerU personality and host of ‘Unapologetic’, Amala Ekpunobi, joins the show and shares her story of going from leftist activism to conservative journalism.
PLUGS:
Check out Amala’s show ‘Unapologetic with Amala’ available at PragerU.com & streaming on YouTube
And follow her on Instagram, @TheAmalaEkpunobi
Watch TJ Miller’s full comedy special, ‘Dear Jonah’ for free on YouTube

item.title: Part 2: Chris D'Elia + WWJCVDD and News (ACS October 4)
item.itunes:title: Part 2: Chris D'Elia + WWJCVDD and News (ACS October 4)
item.description:
Chris D'Elia makes his return to the show and shares his experience of getting 'canceled' and how his outlook has evolved. He also talks about being a new parent before the gang jumps into a round of "What Would Jean-Claude Van Damme Do?" Lastly, Gina reports news stories on: a rapper rapping about stealing from the government, a new Space Force song, cooking chicken with Nyquil, and how many ants there are on the earth.
PLUGS:
Check out Dawson's latest audiobook by Kinky Friedman, A Case of Lone Star, here: https://www.amazon.com/Case-Lone-Star-Masters-Crime/dp/B09SKHXB1Y/ref=tmm_aud_swatch_0?_encoding=UTF8&qid=&sr=
For Chris D'Elia tour dates, visit: ChrisDElia.com
And check out Chris's podcasts, Congratulations with Chris D'Elia and Lifeline
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
TommyJohn.com/ADAM

item.title: Part 1: Puff the Magic Dragon + Dawson's Diet (ACS October 4)
item.itunes:title: Part 1: Puff the Magic Dragon + Dawson's Diet (ACS October 4)
item.description:
Adam opens the show dissecting the song Puff the Magic Dragon and reenacts what the writing process must have been like for Peter, Paul and Mary. This leads him to talk about other songs that have been bothering him lately, including 'Erotic City' by Prince and 'Staying Alive' by Drake and DJ Khaled. Dawson then shares a clip from his latest audiobook project and talks about eating 6 value tacos from Del Taco for lunch.
PLUGS:

item.title: Part 2: Bill O'Reilly + News (ACS October 3)
item.itunes:title: Part 2: Bill O'Reilly + News (ACS October 3)
item.description:
Bill O'Reilly talks to Adam about his new book, ‘KILLING THE LEGENDS: The Lethal Danger of Celebrity’ which profiles the lives and deaths of Elvis Presley, John Lennon, & Muhammad Ali. Bill outlines the risks and dangers of being a celebrity through Ali joining the Nation of Islam, Lennon signing an album for the man who would later assasinate him, Elvis’ manager ruthlessly controlling his career, and more. Gina Grad reports the news of today including: Trevor Noah leaving 'The Daily Show' amid rumors of dating Dua Lipa and a 'Barney' documentary exposing the dark history of the children’s show.
PLUGS:
Read Bill O'Reilly’s new book ‘KILLING THE LEGENDS: The Lethal Danger of Celebrity’ wherever you find books
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:

item.title: Part 1: Harry Hay History + The Rotten Tomatoes Game (ACS October 3)
item.itunes:title: Part 1: Harry Hay History + The Rotten Tomatoes Game (ACS October 3)
item.description:
Adam takes a deeper dive into the life of gay rights activist, Harry Hay, and finally figures out how his grandmother came into the picture. The gang takes a look at Joe Biden’s gaffe where he looked for a deceased congresswoman at a press event. Finally, in honor of the heat in Southern California becoming slightly more bearable, the gang plays a round of ‘The Rotten Tomatoes Game’ with a desert theme.
PLUGS:
Read Bill O'Reilly’s new book ‘KILLING THE LEGENDS: The Lethal Danger of Celebrity’ wherever you find books

item.title: Part 2: Rachael Leigh Cook + News (ACS September 30)
item.itunes:title: Part 2: Rachael Leigh Cook + News (ACS September 30)
item.description:
Actress Rachael Leigh Cook joins Adam in studio to talk about her new movie, ‘Spirit Halloween: The Movie’. They discuss oversized halloween decorations and Bryan asks her about the process of filming Hallmark Christmas movies. Rachael shares how she started acting young in ‘The Babysitter’s Club’ and ‘She’s All That’ before explaining how she’s now taken on a producer's role. Gina Grad reports the news of today including: the sudden death of Coolio, Queen Elizabeth’s death certificate saying she died of ‘old age’, and Chipotle testing a robotic tortilla chip maker.
PLUGS:
See Rachael Leigh Cook’s new movie, ‘Spirit Halloween: The Movie’ opening in select theaters today and available on VOD October 11
Check out Vinnie Tortorich’s podcast ‘Fitness Confidential with Vinnie Tortorich’ wherever you find podcasts
And follow him on Twitter and Instagram, @VinnieTortorich
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
Con-Cret.com/PODCAST
Geico.com

item.title: Part 1: The Works of Ray Stevens + Vinnie Tortorich (ACS September 30)
item.itunes:title: Part 1: The Works of Ray Stevens + Vinnie Tortorich (ACS September 30)
item.description:
Adam welcomes Vinnie Tortorich back to the studio at the top of the show and he joins the gang as they take a look at the works of Ray Stevens who beat out Elton John and James Taylor at the Grammys. Vinnie gives his professional fitness take on the ‘all food has value’ PSA and Adam revisits the time The Young Turks clashed with his opinion on school lunches. The gang compares what their breakfasts and lunches were like growing up and how Adam was fed like an elderly person.
PLUGS:
See Rachael Leigh Cook’s new movie, ‘Spirit Halloween: The Movie’ opening in select theaters today and available on VOD October 11
Check out Vinnie Tortorich’s podcast ‘Fitness Confidential with Vinnie Tortorich’ wherever you find podcasts
And follow him on Twitter and Instagram, @VinnieTortorich
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:

item.title: Part 2: Ali Kolbert + News (ACS September 29)
item.itunes:title: Part 2: Ali Kolbert + News (ACS September 29)
item.description:
Comedian Ali Kolbert gives the gang come insight into the lesbian experience from being in a sorority to convincing men you’re not into them. They talk about the deiniteion of ‘queer’ and look into the status of Miley Cyrus, Harry Hay, and Andy Bell from Erasure. Ali talks about getting engaged and having her eggs frozen before questioning Adam’s fertility. Gina Grad reports the news of today including: Walt Disney World closing due to Hurricane Ian, Dave Chappelle performing 'Creep' with the Foo Fighters’, a chess cheating scandal, and Alec Baldwin welcoming a 7th child.
PLUGS:
Listen to Matt Bilinsky’s ‘The Prevailing Narrative’ wherever you find podcasts
And follow him on Twitter: @MattBilinsky
See Ali Kolbert live at the Improv in Los Angeles on October 20th
And for more dates go to AliKolbert.com
Listen to ‘The Ali Kolbert Show’ wherever you find podcasts
And follow her on Twitter and Instagram: @AliKolbert
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
Con-Cret.com/PODCAST
SimpliSafe.com/ADAM
Keeps.com/ADAM
Geico.com

item.title: Part 1: Queens Subway Attack + Matt Bilinsky (ACS September 29)
item.itunes:title: Part 1: Queens Subway Attack + Matt Bilinsky (ACS September 29)
item.description:
Adam explains why people driving electric cars are likely more prone to speeding tickets before getting into chauffeuring his driving instructor to buy porn and a recent attack in a Queens subway. Business and media attorney, Matt Bilinsky, comes to the studio to talk about the controversy currently surrounding the LA Times and its owner Patrick Soon-Shiong. Matt explains how Patrick has given his 28 year old daughter major influence at the paper and how she seems to be using it to endorse local candidates. They get into Gavin Newsom’s opinion on why people are leaving California and the LA Times tipping off an LA supervisor about a home raid.
PLUGS:
Listen to Matt Bilinsky’s ‘The Prevailing Narrative’ wherever you find podcasts
And follow him on Twitter: @MattBilinsky
See Ali Kolbert live at the Improv in Los Angeles on October 20th
And for more dates go to AliKolbert.com
Listen to ‘The Ali Kolbert Show’ wherever you find podcasts
And follow her on Twitter and Instagram: @AliKolbert
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
Con-Cret.com/PODCAST
SimpliSafe.com/ADAM
Keeps.com/ADAM
Geico.com

item.title: Part 2: Ryan Long + News (ACS September 28)
item.itunes:title: Part 2: Ryan Long + News (ACS September 28)
item.description:
Comedian Ryan Long is in the studio to talk about his comedy tour and explains how quickly shifting trends make it near impossible to release relevant content on time. As a punk rocker himself, Ryan weighs in on the song ‘Uh Oh, Chongo’ and talks about how comedians make the best comedy editors. Gina Grad reports the news of today including: someone hacking into an airplane intercom, NASA’s anti-asteroid satellite successfully smashing into a space rock, a cranberry shortage looming ahead of Thanksgiving, Tiffany Haddish saying she lost all of her gigs after the abuse claim, and Gwyneth Paltrow releasing nudes on her 50th birthday.
PLUGS:
See Ryan Long live on tour:
CLEVELAND, OH - HILARITIES - OCTOBER 2nd
CHICAGO, IL - ZANIES COMEDY CLUB - OCTOBER 3rd & 4th
And find more dates at RyanLongComedy.com
Listen to ‘The Boyscast with Ryan Long’ wherever you find podcast
And follow Ryan on Twitter and Instagram, @RyanLongComedy
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
Con-Cret.com/PODCAST
Geico.com
Get a 4-week trial, free postage, and a digital scale at https://www.stamps.com/ADAM. Thanks to Stamps.com for sponsoring the show

item.title: Part 1: Peyton vs. Eli + Liked Tweets (ACS September 28)
item.itunes:title: Part 1: Peyton vs. Eli + Liked Tweets (ACS September 28)
item.description:
Following Adam’s appearance on Peyton Manning’s show, the gang debates who was the better Manning: Peyton or Eli? They take a look at some Acme mementos John P. McCann sent in from the show ‘Muu-Muus & Girl Drinks’ which he and Adam worked on. Chris presents some ‘Liked Tweets’ including an after school special titled ‘The Day My Kid Went Punk’, Gavin Newsom’s 2008 plan for the homeless, and a crow helping a hedgehog across the street.
PLUGS:
See Ryan Long live on tour:
CLEVELAND, OH - HILARITIES - OCTOBER 2nd
CHICAGO, IL - ZANIES COMEDY CLUB - OCTOBER 3rd & 4th
And find more dates at RyanLongComedy.com

item.title: Part 2: David Koechner + News (ACS September 27)
item.itunes:title: Part 2: David Koechner + News (ACS September 27)
item.description:
David Koechner returns to the show and tells stories about his dad manufacturing turkey coops, his time in high school, and training at Second City in Chicago. Adam and David then laugh about a few scenes from Billy Jack before Gina reports news stories on: Rihanna being chosen to perform at the Super Bowl, Adam Levine DM'ing various women, and a 'screaming children surcharge' at a restaurant.
David has upcoming live shows in Cincinnati, Burbank, and Columbus. For more tour dates and tickets, visit DavidKoechner.com
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
Geico.com SimpliSafe.com/Adam TommyJohn.com/Adam Download InvestAll and use promo code Adam

item.title: Part 1: Former Irish Gangster Richie Stephens + Weird Courtroom Attire (ACS September 27)
item.itunes:title: Part 1: Former Irish Gangster Richie Stephens + Weird Courtroom Attire (ACS September 27)
item.description:
Adam opens the show with an odd observation from a news clip about a man punching a flight attendant. Next, the gang discusses weird dog behavior and some placards that have been bothering Adam. Actor, author, and former Irish gangster Richie Stephens joins the show to talk about his past as a drug trafficker, kidnapper, and addict. Richie shares how he was able to transition from a life of crime to that of a Hollywood actor.
Check out Richie's book, The Gangster's Guide to Sobriety: My Life in 12 Steps, on Amazon now: https://www.amazon.com/Gangsters-Guide-Sobriety-Life-Steps/dp/1637581904
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:

item.title: Introducing: Know Mercy with Stephen A. Smith
item.itunes:title: Introducing: Know Mercy with Stephen A. Smith
item.description: Stephen A. Smith knows mercy…when it’s warranted. On “Know Mercy,” Stephen A. will give you his straight shooter point of view beyond the world of sports, breaking barriers and pulling back the curtain on politics, entertainment, and business. Three times a week, you’ll hear his unfiltered opinions on front page news and pertinent cultural events, as well as interviews with outspoken celebrities and thought leaders across the societal arena. You’re guaranteed to be entertained, informed, and motivated. And one thing will be clear: you don't need to know sports to know mercy. “Know Mercy with Stephen A. Smith” is a presentation of Cadence13, an Audacy studio.

item.title: Jodi Miller + Sammy “The Bull” Gravano (ACS September 26)
item.itunes:title: Jodi Miller + Sammy “The Bull” Gravano (ACS September 26)
item.description:
Writer and comedian Jodi Miller joins Adam as they discuss adoption, farting practices, and what makes them feel alive. They look at some of Adam’s ‘liked tweets’ including a bulldog having diarrhea on a plane and a crow tricking two cats into fighting. Former mobster Sammy “The Bull” Gravano returns to the show to talk about his podcast ‘Our Thing’. He tells the story of the ceremony where he became a made man, explains the mafia hierarchy, and outlines the major differences between the cartel and the mob. He talks about the process of putting a hit on someone and details his participation in two mafia wars.
PLUGS:
Watch Jodi Miller’s shows ‘The World’s Funniest Weather’ and ‘Funny You Should Ask’ by checking your local TV listings
See what Jodi is working on at JodiMillerComedy.com
And follow her on Twitter and Instagram at @JodiMillerComic
Check out Sammy Gravano’s podcast, ‘Our Thing’ available for streaming on Crime & Conspiracy network (app available for download on most devices)
Follow Sammy the Bull on Instagram: @OfficialSammyTheBull
And visit SammyTheBull.com to learn more
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
Geico.com

item.title: Michael Yo + Luenell (ACS September 23)
item.itunes:title: Michael Yo + Luenell (ACS September 23)
item.description:
Michael Yo returns to the show to talk with Adam about chick think vs. dude think, deaging skin cream, Michelle Obama’s book, and handicap horse parking. They are joined by the legendary comedian, Luenell, who talks to them about working with Dave Chappelle on a new special, starting an ‘Only Fans’ page, how she was cast in ‘The Rock’, and how a foot fetish is a victimless crime.
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS: Con-Cret.com/Podcast Geico.com
PLUGS:
Watch Michael Yo’s special, ‘Michael Yo: I Never Thought’ available for free on YouTube here: https://youtu.be/X654tRelADo
See more Michael Yo’s live show dates at MichaelYo.com
Listen to Michael’s podcast, ‘Yo Show with Michael Yo’ wherever you find podcasts
And follow hom on Twitter and Instagram, @MichaelYo
Find Luenell’s live show dates at HeyLuenell.com
And check her out on YouTube and Instagram, @HeyLuenell!

item.title: Part 2: Charlotte Laws + News (ACS September 22)
item.itunes:title: Part 2: Charlotte Laws + News (ACS September 22)
item.description:
Author and advocate Charlotte Laws joins the show to talk about being featured in “The Most Hated Man on the Internet” and her fight against revenge porn. She also recalls her three-year relationship with Tom Jones. Gina then reports news stories about Tommy Lee joining OnlyFans, Byron Allen suing McDonald’s, and Steph Curry getting a billion-dollar endorsement deal. For more with Charlotte, follow her on Twitter @CharlotteLaws.
Please Support Our Sponsors: Con-Cret.com/Podcast Geico.com Etsy.com Promo Code HELLO10 SoloStove.com Promo Code ADAM

item.title: Part 1: Jewel (ACS September 22)
item.itunes:title: Part 1: Jewel (ACS September 22)
item.description:
Adam begins the show sharing a clip of ‘Leave it to Beaver.’ He compares its classic premise to that of a current news story involving a Canadian shop teacher wearing giant prosthetic breasts to class. Next, the gang welcomes Jewel to the program to chat about her humble beginnings as a homeless musician and her unusual journey to stardom. Jewel also shares her thoughts on the music business during her early years and tells a fun story about opening for Bob Dylan. Jewel’s upcoming record Freewheelin' Woman will be available on vinyl October 21.
Please Support Our Sponsors: Con-Cret.com/Podcast Geico.com Etsy.com Promo Code HELLO10 SoloStove.com Promo Code ADAM

item.title: Part 2: Dominic Monaghan + News (ACS September 21)
item.itunes:title: Part 2: Dominic Monaghan + News (ACS September 21)
item.description:
Actor Dominic Monaghan comes into the studio and explains the process of rehabilitating and releasing sick snakes before getting into his critter collection and his love of ants. They all discuss giant squids and what little we know about them and Dominic gives the gang advice for a “starter safari”. Gina Grad reports the news of the day including: a judge overturning the conviction of Adnan Syed, a Beyond Meat executive getting arrested for biting a man's nose, and California allowing human composting as an alternative to cremation or burial.
PLUGS:
Check out Dominic Monaghan’s podcast, ‘Moriarty: The Devil’s Game’ exclusively on Audible
And his other podcast, ‘The Friendship Onion’, available wherever you find finer podcasts
Watch Dominic’s series ‘Moonhaven’ streaming on AMC+
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
Con-Cret.com/PODCAST
Geico.com

item.title: Part 1: Uh Oh, Chongo! + Kim Kahana (ACS September 21)
item.itunes:title: Part 1: Uh Oh, Chongo! + Kim Kahana (ACS September 21)
item.description:
Following their interview with Sid Krofft, Adam is excited to talk to Kim Kahana (aka Chongo) from ‘Danger Island’ as the gang learns more about his unbelievable life. Gina talks about a homeless run-in at the dog park and Adam shows some of his interview with investigator Paul Hole who was instrumental in solving the Golden State Killer case. Chongo himself, Kim Kahana, joins the gang and tells stories of witnessing the attack on Pearl Harbor, being buried alive in a mass grave during the Korean War, and surviving a deadly plane crash.
PLUGS:
Learn more about Kahana's Stunt & Film School by visiting their Facebook page
Check out the book on Kim Kahana’s life, ‘Kahana: The Untold Stories’ wherever you find books
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
Con-Cret.com/PODCAST
Geico.com

item.title: Part 2: Bryan Callen + News (ACS September 20)
item.itunes:title: Part 2: Bryan Callen + News (ACS September 20)
item.description:
Comedian Bryan Callen is in the studio and talks with the gang about K-tel commercials and the true meaning behind Dolly Parton’s ‘Jolene’. Adam shows them pieces of a House Oversight Committee hearing on Big Oil where ‘Chick Think’ quickly takes over the narrative. Gina Grad reports the news of the day including: reports of Woody Allen retiring, Gavin Newsom running for president, and how more people are now smoking marijuana than cigarettes.
PLUGS:
Watch Bryan Callen’s special, ‘Man Tears’ available for free on his YouTube channel https://youtu.be/Wx-r3qSDl4E
Check out Bryan’s YouTube series, ‘Best Of, with Bryan Callen’ on his YouTube Channel
See Bryan live at Spokane Comedy Club, this Thursday through Saturday
Find more dates at BryanCallen.com
And follow him on Twitter and Instagram: @BryanCallen
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
Con-Cret.com/PODCAST
SimpliSafe.com/ADAM
Download DAVE on Apple or Google Play
TommyJohn.com/ADAM
Keeps.com/ADAM

item.title: Part 1: Bryan Callen + Blowing with Zamfir (ACS September 20)
item.itunes:title: Part 1: Bryan Callen + Blowing with Zamfir (ACS September 20)
item.description:
Comedian Bryan Callen returns to the show to talk about his new comedy special, ‘Man Tears’. He joins Adam and the gang as they discuss bird brains, falcon hunting, and the time Adam got into a street fight and took a baseball bat to the knee. Bryan breaks down the Old Testament, reveals the best tippers he knows, and tells a story of trying not to cry when a blind man thanked him. Dawson gives an update on Zamfir the pan flute player and reveals a newly discovered commercial with a surprise guest musician.
PLUGS:
Watch Bryan Callen’s special, ‘Man Tears’ available for free on his YouTube channel https://youtu.be/Wx-r3qSDl4E
Check out Bryan’s YouTube series, ‘Best Of, with Bryan Callen’ on his YouTube Channel
See Bryan live at Spokane Comedy Club, this Thursday through Saturday
Find more dates at BryanCallen.com
And follow him on Twitter and Instagram: @BryanCallen

item.title: Part 2: The Rotten Tomatoes Game + News (ACS September 19)
item.itunes:title: Part 2: The Rotten Tomatoes Game + News (ACS September 19)
item.description:
Dave Dameshek joins the gang for a round of The Rotten Tomatoes Game centered around, for no reason whatsoever, Jon Hamm. Gina Grad reports the news of the day including: the Patagonia founder donating the entire company’s worth to fight climate change, the NBA suspending the owner of the Phoenix Suns, and a nursing home hiring a stripper to entertain the seniors.
PLUGS:
Check out Dave Dameshek’s new trivia show, ‘Mister Lister’, Tuesday Nights at 7pm eastern on Spotify Live
Check out his podcasts ‘Extra Points with Cousin Sal & Dave Dameshek’ and ‘Minus Three’ available wherever you listen to podcasts
And check him out on Twitter, @Dameshek
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
Con-Cret.com/PODCAST
Geico.com

item.title: Part 1: Dave Dameshek + Liked Tweets (ACS September 19)
item.itunes:title: Part 1: Dave Dameshek + Liked Tweets (ACS September 19)
item.description:
The gang looks at some of Adam’s liked tweets including a crow drinking water from a bottle and Oberlin College paying $36.6 million to a bakery they labeled 'racist'. They take a deep dive into what happened to Chongo from ‘Danger Island’ before welcoming Dave Dameshek to the show. Dave talks about getting kicked out of his fantasy football league by Jon Hamm in pure defiance of a legal contract and reviews some highlights from the Chargers Chiefs game.
PLUGS:
Check out Dave Dameshek’s new trivia show, ‘Mister Lister’, Tuesday Nights at 7pm eastern on Spotify Live
Check out his podcasts ‘Extra Points with Cousin Sal & Dave Dameshek’ and ‘Minus Three’ available wherever you listen to podcasts

item.title: Part 2: Sid Krofft + News (ACS September 16)
item.itunes:title: Part 2: Sid Krofft + News (ACS September 16)
item.description:
Sid Krofft and Adam Carolla finally sit down to talk about the elephant in the room, namely Adam’s constant criticism. They get into how much of Sid’s work impacted Adam‘s childhood and talk about ‘Pryor's Place’, ‘Pink Lady and Jeff’, ‘Donnie and Marie’, and more. Sid tells stories about touring with Judy Garland and Liberace, designing costumes for ‘The Banana Splits Adventure Hour’, seeing Frank Sinatra knocked out by a bullfighter in a bar fight, and the Beatles demanding episodes of ‘H.R. Pufnstuf’ be sent to their hotel rooms. He explains how he had nothing to do with the ‘Land of the Lost’ remake before Adam and Sid team up to talk trash about Jeff Altman.
PLUGS:
Check out Sid Krofft’s show ‘Sundays With Sid’ with new episodes 3pm Pacific every Sunday on his Instagram: @SidKrofft
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
Geico.com
Con-Cret.com/PODCAST
SimpliSafe.com/ADAM

item.title: Part 1: Michael Schwimer + Listener Calls (ACS September 16)
item.itunes:title: Part 1: Michael Schwimer + Listener Calls (ACS September 16)
item.description:
The gang is feeling anxious about their upcoming interview with Sid Krofft, and Adam plays a clip from his audio book where he absolutely slams him. Former MLB relief pitcher and CEO of Big League Advantage, Michael Schwimer, joins the show to talk about investing in the careers of minor league baseball players to support them making it to the majors. Adam takes a listener call from someone who poses a hypothetical sexual situation with interesting results.
PLUGS:
Learn more about Michael Schwimer’s investment firm at BigLeagueAdvantage.com

item.title: Part 2: Jonathan Kite + News (ACS September 15)
item.itunes:title: Part 2: Jonathan Kite + News (ACS September 15)
item.description:
Actor and comedian, Jonathan Kite, returns to the show where he tries his hand at an Adam Carolla impression and explains the difference between doing impressions and voice matching. He joins them for a round of ‘Made Up Movie’ while impersonating Paul Giamatti. Gina Grad reports the news of the day including: VP Kamala Harris’ ‘Meet the Press’ appearance, and Jimmy Kimmel getting slammed for ‘upstaging’ Quinta Brunson’s Emmy acceptance speech.
PLUGS:
See Jonathan Kite live:
Hollywood, CA - Improv Lab - Tonight (September 14th)
Batavia, IL - Comedy Vault - September 22nd through 24th
For more dates visit: JonathanKiteComedy.com
And follow him on Instagram, @JonathanKite
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
Stamps.com enter ADAM
Geico.com
Con-Cret.com/PODCAST

item.title: Part 1: Liked Tweets + Maria Kanellis (ACS September 15)
item.itunes:title: Part 1: Liked Tweets + Maria Kanellis (ACS September 15)
item.description:
Adam revisits the late John Pinette’s infamous Chinese buffet bit. The gang takes a look at some ‘Liked Tweets’ including the LA Unified School District promoting a ‘food neutrality’ video and the San Francisco Bicycle Coalition saying not to call the police about stolen bikes. Professional wrestler, Maria Kanellis, comes on the show and shares some stories and insight into how women in wrestling have evolved over the years and what it feels like to get super kicked in the head. They talk about Vince McMahon’s chin, David Arquette, ‘The Genius’ and ‘Bad News Brown’. Adam remembers the time he wrestled as ‘the Calligrapher’ where Jimmy Kimmel was injured in a scrotum costume.
PLUGS:
Watch Maria Kanellis’ wrestling show, ‘Women’s Wrestling Army’, new episodes airing every Wednesday exclusively on Pro Wrestling TV
And follow her on Instagram, @MariaKanellis
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
Stamps.com enter ADAM
Geico.com
Con-Cret.com/PODCAST
Freshly.com/ACS
Investall.ai enter ADAM

item.title: Michael Yo + Thomas Jane (ACS September 14)
item.itunes:title: Michael Yo + Thomas Jane (ACS September 14)
item.description:
Comedian Michael Yo joins Adam as actor Thomas Jane comes into the studio to talk about his new movie ‘Dig’ which he stars in with his daughter. They talk about rebranding Bigfoot as Sasquatch, conspiracy theories, TV award shows, ‘The Greaseman’, and a student identifying as a cat. Thomas takes Adam and Michael on a deep dive into aliens before the three make predictions about America’s future.
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:

item.title: Night 2 - Live from Austin, Texas (ACS September 13)
item.itunes:title: Night 2 - Live from Austin, Texas (ACS September 13)
item.description:
Adam takes the stage live from Cap City Comedy Club in Austin, TX. He recaps his day starting with a tailgate catered by BBQ pitmaster Aaron Franklin. He then talks about attending the Alabama vs Texas game and compliments Texas on its strong community as well as its very attractive women. After sharing some thoughts on hotel gyms, he introduces Gina and Bryan and the three play a spirited round of Blah Blah Blog. Gina reports news stories about a man pulling a gun after nobody thanked him for holding the door and what nurses call ugly babies. Lastly, Adam takes topics submitted by the audience for a round of Adam Carolla is Unprepared.
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
The Jordan Harbinger Show
BetterHelp.com/CAROLLA
LandsEnd.com/ADAM
Con-Cret.com/PODCAST
Geico.com

item.title: Brian Bosworth, Live from Cap City Comedy Club in Austin (ACS September 12)
item.itunes:title: Brian Bosworth, Live from Cap City Comedy Club in Austin (ACS September 12)
item.description:
Adam comes to you live from Capitol City Comedy Club in Austin, Texas. He welcomes former linebacker and current actor, Brian Bosworth, who explains the difference between playing college ball versus the NFL and details his experience filming the short lived series ‘Lawless’. Bryan and Gina join them for a round of ‘The Rotten Tomatoes Game’ centered around movies related to Brian Bosworth. Gina Grad reports the news of the day including: a restaurant promoting a 9/11 themed menu and the FAA speaking out about airplane seat sizes. Lastly, Adam does a round of 'Adam Carolla is Unprepared,' taking audience suggestions for topics to laugh about.
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
The Jordan Harbinger Show
Geico.com
Con-Cret.com/PODCAST

item.title: Part 2: Frankie Quiñones + News (ACS September 9)
item.itunes:title: Part 2: Frankie Quiñones + News (ACS September 9)
item.description:
Actor and comedian Frankie Quiñones comes into the studio to talk about his new Hulu series, ‘This Fool’ where he plays a released convict readjusting to society. They discuss the many uses of ‘fool’, California’s Prop 27, comedian Charlie Hill, and more. Gina Grad reports the news of today including: Ricky Martin suing his nephew for extortion, Aries Spears breaking his silence on the molestation lawsuit with Tiffany Haddish, the ‘'Dancing with the Stars' season 31 celebrity cast reveal, rumors of Tom Brady and Gisele Bundchen separating, and China censoring the ending of 'Minions: The Rise of Gru'.
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
SimpliSafe.com/ADAM
Geico.com
Con-Cret.com/PODCAST

item.title: Part 1: Mr. Birchum’s KROQ Debut + Willie Mays Aikens (ACS September 9)
item.itunes:title: Part 1: Mr. Birchum’s KROQ Debut + Willie Mays Aikens (ACS September 9)
item.description:
Adam and the gang discuss the passing of Queen Elizabeth before getting into ‘If I Were a Carpenter’ by Bobby Darin. Adam revisits the first ever appearance of Dick Birchum on the Kevin and Bean show and gives an update on the KROQ documentary. Former MLB player and prison inmate, Willie Mays Aikens, talks to Adam about the new biopic about his life, ‘The Royal’. Willie shares his experiences playing major league baseball, getting arrested for crack cocaine, and the difficulties he faced after his release.

item.title: Part 1: Fantasy Football with Jon Hamm + Kyle Mann from the Babylon Bee (ACS September 8)
item.itunes:title: Part 1: Fantasy Football with Jon Hamm + Kyle Mann from the Babylon Bee (ACS September 8)
item.description:
Mike August calls in to explain an incident with Jon Hamm and Dave Dameshek in their fantasy football league. The gang looks at an Orwellian graduation pledge and discusses racist overtones with the ‘Flowbee’. Editor-in-chief of ‘The Babylon Bee’, Kyle Mann comes into the studio and talks about the challenges of writing satire in 2022 when anything can happen. They look at some of the times ‘The Babylon Bee’ accidentally predicted the future as ridiculous as it seemed at the time. Kyle talks about getting suspended from Twitter and Adam creates a new game involving Avril Lavigne and Admiral Levine.
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:

item.title: Part 2: Will Sasso and Chad Kultgen + News (ACS September 7)
item.itunes:title: Part 2: Will Sasso and Chad Kultgen + News (ACS September 7)
item.description:
Actor Will Sasso comes into the studio with writer Chad Kultgen to talk about their new podcast, ‘Dudesy’. They explain how it is the first podcast to be run using artificial intelligence and how they are both happy to have submitted to the AI overlords early on. Gina Grad reports the news of today including: the Bed Bath & Beyond CFO jumping to their death, Harry Styles appearing to spit on Chris Pine, and Jennette McCurdy reading a disturbing email from her abusive mom.
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:

item.title: Part 1: CNN Rebrand + Do Yourself a Favor (ACS September 7)
item.itunes:title: Part 1: CNN Rebrand + Do Yourself a Favor (ACS September 7)
item.description:
With CNN restructuring following the decline of their journalistic batting average, Adam revisits some past headlines about Trump reopening schools. They get into the boxing history of Donovan "Razor" Ruddock including his matches against Mike Tyson and Tommy ‘The Duke’ Morrison. The gang takes listeners calls for another segment of ‘Do Yourself a Favor’ including tips for parking your car in the heat, dealing with your in-laws, and cooking for impatient children.

item.title: Part 2: Liz Miele + News (ACS September 6)
item.itunes:title: Part 2: Liz Miele + News (ACS September 6)
item.description:
Comedian Liz Miele joins the gang in the studio to talk about her new special, ‘The Ghost Of Academic Future’. She talks about being an early adopter of YouTube and how she used social media and mailing lists to grow her audience. Liz and Adam compare their feelings about cats, napping, and catnapping. Gina Grad reports the news of today including: Tiffany Haddish and Aries Spears being accused of sexually abusing children, Kanye West’s family drama on Instagram, Jeff Garlin's character getting killed off in 'The Goldbergs', Ozzy and Sharon Osbourne making their return to reality TV, and the Raven’s macot getting injured on the field.
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
SimpliSafe.com/ADAM
Con-Cret.com/PODCAST
Geico.com
The Jordan Harbinger Show
TommyJohn.com/ADAM

item.title: Part 1: Maitland Ward (ACS September 6)
item.itunes:title: Part 1: Maitland Ward (ACS September 6)
item.description:
The gang revisits Adam’s twitter war with the teachers union and they take a look at the California bill which would punish doctors who spread misinformation. Former sitcom actor and current adult film star, Maitland Ward, comes into the studio to talk about her new book, ‘Rated X: How Porn Liberated Me from Hollywood’. She explains how the transition didn’t happen overnight and educates Adam on the process of getting your vagina casted to make sex toys. She talks about acting on ‘Boy Meets World’ and people constantly quoting her role in ‘White Chicks’.
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
SimpliSafe.com/ADAM
Con-Cret.com/PODCAST

item.title: Part 2: Dan Dunn + News (ACS September 2)
item.itunes:title: Part 2: Dan Dunn + News (ACS September 2)
item.description:
Spirits expert Dan Dunn returns to the show to share some refreshing cocktails to enjoy during the heatwave. Dan is joined by master mixologist, Paul Sanguinetti who gives the gang some samples to try. They all discuss the worst spirits they've ever tasted, the problems with certain straws, smuggling lemons, and the surprising combination of scotch and coconut. Gina Grad reports the news of today including: the US life expectancy dropping, a Southwest Airlines passenger AirDropping nude photos to other fliers, a Yale student group apologizing for committing 'violence' after cleaning up a homeless encampment, and an alfredo sauce spill causing a highway to close.
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
SimpliSafe.com/ADAM
Con-Cret.com/PODCAST
Geico.com

The gang is feeling the heat with dangerously high temperatures in Southern California and Dawson tells a story of how he was cut off from the AC in an Uber. After a year break, they resurrect the game ‘Dead or Alive’ to guess the living status of some beloved celebrities.

item.title: Part 2: Amir K + News (ACS September 1)
item.itunes:title: Part 2: Amir K + News (ACS September 1)
item.description:
Comedian Amir K comes into the studio and talks about being on the ‘Mad TV’ reboot with Adam Ray, touring with Maz Jobrani, getting heckled by his mother on stage, immigrating from Iran to Southern California, and working as a real estate appraiser. Gina Grad reports the news of the day including: the death of Soviet leader Mikhail Gorbachev, a Saudi woman jailed for using social media, and billboards warning people not to move to Texas.

item.title: Part 1: Adam Ray + Made Up Movie (ACS September 1)
item.itunes:title: Part 1: Adam Ray + Made Up Movie (ACS September 1)
item.description:
Comedian Adam Ray returns to the show and talks about relearning how to skate in order to play an MC on the upcoming series, ‘Welcome to Chippendales’. Adam talks about performing standup with a sign language interpreter at the Salt Lake City show and Will Ferrell’s SNL ventriloquist sketch. They all play a round of ‘Made Up Movie’ featuring titles such as: ‘Space Wolf’, ‘Driving Miss Oprah’, and ‘Surf & Turf’.

item.title: Michael Yo + Tia Carrere (ACS August 31)
item.itunes:title: Michael Yo + Tia Carrere (ACS August 31)
item.description:
Adam welcomes back comedian Michael Yo to the show. The guys chat about Adam's recent notary problems and a recumbent bicyclist at the Salt Lake City airport. Next, actress and musician Tia Carrere joins the guys to talk about her new movie ‘Easter Sunday’. The 3 get into Hawaiian culture, the Aries Spears/Lizzo controversy, and the history of Playgirl Magazine. Chris then shares some news stories about Elon Musk being body-shamed, Euphoria actress Sydney Sweeney facing backlash for a party, and Hugh Hefner's behavior with his old girlfriends.
THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
Geico.com
SimpliSafe.com/ADAM
